infoPlist.NSCameraUsageDescription: This app uses the camera to scan QR codes for authentication purposes.
infoPlist.NSPhotoLibraryUsageDescription: This app requires access to your photo library to select and upload images.
infoPlist.NSLocationWhenInUseUsageDescription: This app uses your location to provide location-based services and enhance user experience.

ios.podfile.properties.post_install:
installer.pods_project.targets.each do |target|
  if target.name == 'Pods-f-e' # Replace 'f-e' with your project name
    target.build_configurations.each do |config|
      config.build_settings['OTHER_SWIFT_FLAGS'] ||= ['$(inherited)']
      config.build_settings['OTHER_SWIFT_FLAGS'] << '-DDEBUG'
    end
  end
end
pod 'MetaWearablesDATCore', :git => 'https://github.com/facebook/meta-wearables-dat-ios.git', :tag => 'v1.0.0'
